mapper.select: SELECT r.resid_no, r.resid_name, r.resid_address, r.resid_type, MIN(rr.price_per_night) AS min_price, pp.thumbnailUrls FROM residence r LEFT JOIN residence_rooms rr ON r.resid_no = rr.resid_no LEFT JOIN reservations res ON rr.room_no = res.room_no LEFT JOIN property_photos pp ON r.resid_no = pp.resid_no -- 사진 테이블 조인 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( -- 예약된 기간과 겹치는 방이 모두 존재하는 경우를 제외 SELECT 1 FROM residence_rooms rr2 LEFT JOIN reservations res_check ON rr2.room_no = res_check.room_no WHERE rr2.resid_no = r.resid_no AND ( -- 예약된 기간과 사용자가 예약하려는 기간이 겹치는지 체크 (#{checkoutDate} >= res_check.checkin_date AND res_check.checkout_date >= #{checkinDate}) ) GROUP BY rr2.resid_no HAVING COUNT(rr2.room_no) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM residence_rooms WHERE resid_no = r.resid_no) ) GROUP BY r.resid_no, pp.thumbnailUrls;
